pages.text: $(l)Carry On: Pick Up and Go!$() $(br2)With the Carry On mod, you can pick up friendly mobs, chests, spawners, and more with your own two hands. Shift-right click with two empty hands to pick up what you want to move.
$(l)What You Can Carry$() $(br2)- Friendly mobs $(br2)- Chests and other storage $(br2)- Spawners $(br2)- Workstations $(br2)- Anvils $(br2)- And more!
$(l)How to Pick Up Items$() $(br2)To pick up an item or mob, simply shift-right click with two empty hands. Carry your cargo to its new location and right-click to put it down.
